Name: Rocket of Whispers: Prologue
About the game: Rocket of Whispers: Prologue is a short narrative game with a very short playtime. It takes place before the main game, OPUS: Rocket of Whispers, and tells the story of Fei Lin’s first waking moments. Story “Fei... Have you awakened?” When I awoke, I was all alone. The familiar scenery around me, were in ruins. In a chilling cellar below the apocalyptic snow, Fei Lin the witch wakes up from hibernation, and ventures into the forsaken world. Guide her through the process of escaping the cellar, and seeing the changed world for her first time. “If you awaken to a world in ruin, please... return us...” - Church Elder With an important mission and the hopes of the people resting on her shoulders, Fei Lin takes her first steps into a lonely, empty world that has been forgotten by time itself. Game Features Explore Fei Lin’s origin Escape the cellar! A hauntingly beautiful world An audiovisual marvel ========================================== ※ This is a free mini companion piece for OPUS: Rocket of Whispers, created for our fans.
